creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: Five separate sections; each piece has a woven center of red weft threads woven through bundles of white linen warp, the pieces are folded in half, and the resulting warp ends are bound and wrapped with white linen. Each section results in a fan shape, consisting of ten tan large tassels joined at the top by four strands of red thread stitched multiple times through each

title: Evolving Tapestry
